content: आश्व {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (श्वी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [अश्वस्येदं अण्] {@--1@} Belonging to or coming from a horse, equestrian; आश्वं कफहरं मूत्रं कृमिदद्रुषु शस्यते <ls>Suśr.</ls> {@--2@} Drawn by horses (as a chariot). --श्वं {@--1@} A number of horses. {@--2@} A chariot drawn by horses. {@--3@} The state or action of a horse (अश्वस्य भावः कर्म वा <ls>Sk.</ls>).
